mapper.select: select * from a_noticeboard where del_yn = 'N' order by writeDate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select save_file_name from a_notice_img where notice_code = #{notice_code} and creID = #{a_id}

insert into a_noticeboard(a_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_type, notice_startDate, notice_endDate, post_check, post_chennel, topView_check) values(#{a_id}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_type}, #{notice_startDate}, #{notice_endDate}, #{post_check}, #{post_chennel}, #{topView_check})

mapper.select: select enquire_NO, title, hit_cnt, creDate, u_id, reply_yn, del_yn from a_enquireboard where del_yn = 'N' order by enquire_NO desc
select enquire_NO, title, contents, hit_cnt, u_id, creDate, del_yn from a_enquireboard where enquire_NO = #{enquire_NO}
mapper.update: update a_enquireboard set hit_cnt = hit_cnt + 1 where enquire_NO = #{enquire_NO}

mapper.select: select enquire_NO, re_contents, date_format(creDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as creDate, a_id, del_yn from a_enquire_reply where enquire_NO = #{enquire_NO} order by creDate desc
mapper.update: update a_enquireboard set reply_yn = 'Y' where enquire_NO = #{enquire_NO}
